title: #595: The Stargates Of Michigan With Chad Stuemke
description:
Thank you so much for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode we welcome Chad Stuemke to discuss his research into Stargates around Michigan and the legend of the Michigan Mauler. Thank you for your support.
